creator: Infinity Games, Lda
descriptionHtml:
Furzies: mergedoku a line block puzzle game. This mobile game is an endless and minimalist challenge.

With this relaxing and challenging block-doku with a furry characters puzzle game, you'll get addicted to this new game.

Test your IQ and train your brain with our little monsters and furry monsters. Your most important and biggest goal is to get the highest score.

QUIET AND ZEN MERGEGOKU GAME
Furzies is an easy to play and learn block puzzle game, but you'll want to play as long as you can to beat your own score. This is a fun, simple, free block puzzle game that you can play on your break or anytime you want to have fun or improve your concentration!

ADDICTIVE BLOCK-DOKU GAME
✔9x9 block doku board. Join the furzies blocks on the grid. If you like Sudoku, you will probably love this game
✔ You can make simple line combinations horizontally, vertically or in boxes
✔ Players can combine similar furzies to improve them
✔ The goal is to keep the grid as empty as possible for the longest time/moves.
✔ Multiple furzies effects can result in multipliers in the score

FURZIES AMAZING CHARACTERS
You would like to meet our little Furzies, here is some information about them:
🔷 Shavespeare: it loves to read a book, relaxation for the body and excercise fot the mind
🔷 Sandy: enjoys taking long walks on the beach after putting in a hard day’s work
🔷 Pablo: nothing says unwind like spending an entire day fishing
🔷 Furzie: eats breakfast food any time of day and likes chasing fireflies on days off
🔷 King Saturn: currently looking for a fluffy companion to go stargazing with. Liking cakes is a plus
🔷 Wooly: professional sheep counter. Current record: 7
🔷 Honey: chill out hobbies: crochet and beekeeping, not necessarily at the same time
🔷 Furdinand: likes: cultivating aromatic herbs. Dislikes: cold rainy days and small cakes
🔷 Ja-fur: teaches yoga and loves chamomile tea. Recently started getting into oil painting
🔷 Prince Hairy: massage afficionado, may or may not have tried aromatherapy to relax

WHY DO YOU HAVE TO PLAY FURZIES?
Join us for these charming merge and block doku games. Is a super fun, cute, minimalistic, addictive and classic block puzzle game designed to entertain you as much as possible.

Have fun with this new title from Infinity Games, an expert in minimal and relaxing gameplay!

We look forward to bringing you more and more features in future updates.
Check us out at: https://infinitygames.io

descriptionHtml:
Furzies: mergedoku a line block puzzle game. This mobile game is an endless and minimalist challenge.

With this relaxing and challenging block-doku with a furry characters puzzle game, you'll get addicted to this new game.

Test your IQ and train your brain with our little monsters and furry monsters. Your most important and biggest goal is to get the highest score.

QUIET AND ZEN MERGEGOKU GAME
Furzies is an easy to play and learn block puzzle game, but you'll want to play as long as you can to beat your own score. This is a fun, simple, free block puzzle game that you can play on your break or anytime you want to have fun or improve your concentration!

ADDICTIVE BLOCK-DOKU GAME
✔9x9 block doku board. Join the furzies blocks on the grid. If you like Sudoku, you will probably love this game
✔ You can make simple line combinations horizontally, vertically or in boxes
✔ Players can combine similar furzies to improve them
✔ The goal is to keep the grid as empty as possible for the longest time/moves.
✔ Multiple furzies effects can result in multipliers in the score

FURZIES AMAZING CHARACTERS
You would like to meet our little Furzies, here is some information about them:
🔷 Shavespeare: it loves to read a book, relaxation for the body and excercise fot the mind
🔷 Sandy: enjoys taking long walks on the beach after putting in a hard day’s work
🔷 Pablo: nothing says unwind like spending an entire day fishing
🔷 Furzie: eats breakfast food any time of day and likes chasing fireflies on days off
🔷 King Saturn: currently looking for a fluffy companion to go stargazing with. Liking cakes is a plus
🔷 Wooly: professional sheep counter. Current record: 7
🔷 Honey: chill out hobbies: crochet and beekeeping, not necessarily at the same time
🔷 Furdinand: likes: cultivating aromatic herbs. Dislikes: cold rainy days and small cakes
🔷 Ja-fur: teaches yoga and loves chamomile tea. Recently started getting into oil painting
🔷 Prince Hairy: massage afficionado, may or may not have tried aromatherapy to relax

WHY DO YOU HAVE TO PLAY FURZIES?
Join us for these charming merge and block doku games. Is a super fun, cute, minimalistic, addictive and classic block puzzle game designed to entertain you as much as possible.

Have fun with this new title from Infinity Games, an expert in minimal and relaxing gameplay!

We look forward to bringing you more and more features in future updates.
Check us out at: https://infinitygames.io

Have fun with this new title from Infinity Games, an expert in minimal and relaxing gameplay!

We look forward to bringing you more and more features in future updates.
Check us out at: https://infinitygames.io
descriptionShort: This is a beautiful furry block doku puzzle. You’ll like our puzzle challenge.
